name: Avidex
overview:
Avidex is an award-winning, full service audiovisual firm. An innovative leader in the design, integration, project management, equipment procurement and support services of audiovisual solutions for commercial and healthcare clients throughout the U.S. Avidex also offers a broad range of equipment rental and show services.

Avidex successfully partners with architects, contractors, consultants, educators and executives to create boardrooms, videoconference rooms, auditoriums, training facilities, digital signage and many additional projects that incorporate audiovisual needs. With a current staff of over 130 employees, the people at Avidex have the background and knowledge to provide you with the best possible experience in implementing audiovisual and multimedia technologies. Over the past 10 years Avidex has successfully completed many International jobs in more than a dozen different countries ranging from Europe to Asia and has completed jobs in over 26 states. Avidex is a true single source for all audiovisual needs.
